title: ITableAnnotation.GetSplitInformation
description: Gets information about any splits in this table.
signature:
System.Int32 GetSplitInformation( 
   out System.Int32
Index
,
   out System.Int32
Count
,
   out System.Int32
RangeStart
,
   out System.Int32
RangeEnd
)

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Piece of the table that this is

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Piece of the table that this is

parameters.name: RangeStart
parameters.description: Beginning row for this piece of the table

parameters.name: RangeEnd
parameters.description: Ending row for this piece of the table

returns: Direction in which the table was split as defined by swTableSplitDirection_e
remarks: A table split is a table divided into multiple tables, also called pieces.
